revised_title: Walter Russell Brain: A Pioneering Physician and Medical Statesman
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of Walter Russell Brain, the 1st Baron Brain of Eynsham, a prominent physician, medical statesman, and public servant. It covers his early life, education, and career, including his experiences during World War I, when he worked in X-ray departments and later pursued medicine. Brain became a leading figure in British medicine, contributing to the fields of neurophysiology and medical education.
